title: FS:  T206's - Tinker, Crawford, Bradley SOV150

posts.post_title: FS:  T206's - Tinker, Crawford, Bradley SOV150
posts.post_content:
FS:  T206 - HOFs Tinker bat on, Crawford throwing.  Bradley SOV 150 back and Cy Seymour Batting.  All prices delivered, PayPal (payment owed) or check.  First post, email or PM.  Thanks!

*Bradley Port, SOV150, GAI 3.5 - $75
*Crawford Throwing, P150, PSA4 - $245
*Tinker Bat On, P350-460, Fact 25, PSA4 - $250
*Seymour Batting, P150, SGC40 - $45 **SOLD**
I'd like the Seymour.  Thank you.
